news.content:
Your Weekly 3Node Update!


https://forum.threefold.io/t/january-11th-3node-team-update-v3-migration-shipping-updates/1739


We have some important information on migration from Grid 2 to Grid 3 for Titan Farmers and DIY Farmers, as well as shipping updates for all parts of the world.


For questions or feedback please use our forum or the farmers chat. Support team is also available via live chat on threefold.io for support-specific questions! üôè
news.excerpt: This week we have some important migration information and shipping updates!

previous.title: Your January 6 3Node Team Update
previous.excerpt: This week's update is focused on shipping as well as farming rewards, anda  reminder about our deep dives!
